name: LilyCon 2017
description:
Rhiannon: cosplay enthusiast, loving girlfriend, and waiting for Mia.
Mia: Currently lost, and easily distracted.

You take the role of Mia, a young woman attending LilyCon 2017, the world's greatest yuri convention. Unfortunately, Mia has no idea where her girlfriend, Rhiannon, is waiting for her. Wander through the convention hall in a manner similar to text-based adventure games of old, as you encounter various distractions that might hinder your progress.

Created for Yuri Game Jam 2017.
(This game may be updated in the future with polished, coloured graphics, expanded text, and potentially music or other fancifuls.)
